component.name: libjpeg
component.summary: libjpeg is a library which contains a widely-used implementation of a JPEG decoder, JPEG encoder and other JPEG utilities.

issues.remark: See /change.log/ file in src directory. Please send bug reports, offers of help, etc. to jpeg-info@uc.ag
